entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
TEMPERATURE FALLING INTO THE MID 30S IN THE AFTERNOON
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
MUCH COOLER WITH LOWS AROUND 18
NORTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST 5 TO 10 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING WEST IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S
LOWS 10 TO 15
